mapper.select: SELECT boardno, tag, title, writer, hit, writtendate FROM freeboard_notice_kg WHERE rownum <= 3 ORDER BY boardno DESC
SELECT boardno, tag, title, writer, hit, writtendate FROM freeboard_kg WHERE rownum <= 5 ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT boardno, tag, store_name storeName, loc, content, writer, hit, score, writtendate, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tastycomment_kg WHERE boardno = tastyboard_kg.boardno ) AS commentCnt, ( SELECT min(fileno) FROM tastyfile_kg WHERE boardno = tastyboard_kg.boardno ) AS fileno FROM tastyboard_kg WHERE rownum <= 5 ORDER BY boardno DESC
SELECT * FROM usedboard_kg WHERE rownum <= 7 ORDER BY boardno DESC

uni_name LIKE '%' || '#{keyword }' || '%'
